features: SUPER VAUE SET - Includes 8-inch Chef Knife, 8-inch Santoku Knife, 8-inch Carving Knife, 8-inch Serrated Bread Knife, 4.5-inch Utility Knife, 3.5-inch Paring Knife, 4.5-inch Steak Knife x 6, Sharpening Rod, Kitchen Shears, Pizza Cutter, Cheese Grater and Storage Block, All-in-one knife set covers all the essentials pro chefs or busy home cooks will need

HIGH CARBON STAINLRSS STEEL - All knives’ blade is forged from premium quality high-carbon stainless steel, Creating a stronger, harder blade to resist stains, rust and pitting, Highly polished solid blades with razor-sharp edge for more precise cuts and trimming without tearing foods, Full-tang construction provides ultimate strength and durability

ERGONOMIC DESIGN - Thick angled bolster gives better balance and protects the hand from slipping onto the blade, Black ABS handle is built to outlast cracks, chips, and discoloration, Fitting comfortably in the hand and rocking back and forth easily in both chopping and slicing motion, Never tire your hands and won't slip even it is wet

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL KNIVES SET - This versatile knife set is suitable for kitchen, home, restaurant, outdoors on a camping trip or picnic, Great for chopping, slicing, cutting, dicing, deboning, and carving, Easy to slice tomatoes, chop onions, cut up carrots, bone a chicken and create thin ribbons of basil, Perfect gift for anniversaries, birthdays, Father’s Day, housewarming, Christmas

EASY TO STORE & CARE - Walnut wood block designed with proper-sized slots makes a safer place to store your slicers but also a gorgeous statement on the countertop, Keep them sharp and easily complement any kitchen decor, Clean and dry them before storing in the block to protect the sharpness and glossiness even after a long time use
body.description: 17-Piece Kitchen Knife with Wooden Block Set All-in-one Knife Set Meets All Kinds of Needs A knife is one of the most important tools you must have in your kitchen. However, you will need different types of knives for various purposes like cutting bread, mincing, dicing, peeling, slicing, etc. That's why our knife set come with so many knives to make sure you always have a special tool for the type of work you are doing. High Carbon Stainless Steel - Creates a stronger, harder blade, stains, rust and pitting resistant Black ABS Handle with Reinforced Endcaps - Comfortable to grip, never Tire your hand Razor-sharp Edge - Finely honed for long-lasting sharpness, boasts precision cutting Full-tang Construction - Easy to control, provides ultimate strength and durability Thicker Bolster - Protects your fingers, well-balanced and easy to use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Are you looking for the best basic kitchen knife set ? Check out E-far Premium 17-Piece Knife Block Set. They are made from superior high-carbon stainless steel, which enables them to maintain their ultra-sharp edges longer than the conventional stainless steel blades. Forged and full tang, they feel good in your hand, are easy to control and are neither too heavy nor too light. Enjoy easy meal prep and paper-thin cuts with minimal effort with this lightweight, easy-to-use knife set.

17-Piece Kitchen Knife with Block Set This versatile knife set is suitable for kitchen, home, restaurant, outdoors on a camping trip or picnic, declutter your kitchen counter while make it look gorgeous! Package included 1 x Chef Knife, 1 x Santoku Knife, 1 x Carving Knife, 1 x Serrated Bread Knife 1 x Utility Knife, 1 x Paring Knife, 6 x Steak Knife, 1 x Sharpener 1 x Kitchen Shears, 1 x Pizza Cutter, 1 x Cheese Grater, 1 x Storage Block 17-Piece Kitchen Knife with Wooden Block Set All-in-one Knife Set Meets All Kinds of Needs A knife is one of the most important tools you must have in your kitchen. However, you will need different types of knives for various purposes like cutting bread, mincing, dicing, peeling, slicing, etc. That's why our knife set come with so many knives to make sure you always have a special tool for the type of work you are doing. High Carbon Stainless Steel - Creates a stronger, harder blade, stains, rust and pitting resistant Black ABS Handle with Reinforced Endcaps - Comfortable to grip, never Tire your hand Razor-sharp Edge - Finely honed for long-lasting sharpness, boasts precision cutting Full-tang Construction - Easy to control, provides ultimate strength and durability Thicker Bolster - Protects your fingers, well-balanced and easy to use
Perfect Gift for anniversaries, birthdays, Father’s Day, housewarming, Christmas.

Different Types of Knives for Various Purposes Maintain Tips After use, use a rag to dry the water on the knife surface and store it in a dry place to prevent the knife from corroding and rusting.Do not leave salt or acid food juice on the knife surface for too long, which may cause corrosion and rust.Regular grinding of the blade can prolong the service life of the knives.In order to ensure the effect of the knife, please choose different types of knives for cutting different objects.The knives cannot be washed in the dishwasher. Hand washing is recommended to protect the blade.Please keep the knife in the block and out of reach of children when not in use.

Multi-purpose Kitchen Shears Stainless steel blade resists rust, stains, and pitting.A versatile cooking scissors can be held with either right or left hand.Used for cutting ingredients such as crabs, chicken, kelp, openning bottles or cans, and crushing walnuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't skip over these due to price
reviews.reviewText: I almost didn't buy this knife set due to its extremely low price. How could a complete set of knives be any good at this price point, I asked myself. I decided to give them a try as our much more expensive "Chicago Cutlery" set was breaking down after 4-5 years of light use. Upon opening the box and handling the knives for the first time, I was very surprised and impressed with the heft, weight and balance of each one. Compared to our old ones, these felt like a $400+ set. I then assumed they wouldn't cut very well, wrong. After hand cleaning them (recommended by the manufacturer), I cut a very ripe tomato with perfection. We have had this set now for a number of weeks and can't imagine going back to our old set, even if it was new. These knives are that good. There are a few small caveats to note. First, the openings in the storage block aren't exactly uniform, which can cause the knives to rest slightly out of alignment. This isn't a bother for us, but could be for those looking for a perfect presentation on their counter. Second, the angle that the knives rest at are more vertical and require pulling nearly straight up to remove the longer pieces. We had stored our old set under the upper cabinets, but can't remove the longer pieces as the handle comes in contact with the bottom of our cabinets before it is completely removed. Relocating our block fixed this issue, but I would have like to have been aware of it before ordering. Longevity is unknown, but if they last a year, I'll break even compared to our old set. Based on how they look and feel, I expect many years of service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty and very sharp knife set
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this knife set. Pleasantly surprised how much weight each knife holds, including the six steak knives. Beautiful storage block which coordinate so well with my kitchen. Love the black and stainless steel. Great purchase at a very good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These knives are sharp and there’s such a variety. They’re nice and sturdy. Definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sharpest knives and look amazing. Don’t even hesitate....these are fabulous

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These knives are far beyond what I expected. The weight in my hand of each knife is solid and sturdy, the rosewood is more than what I expected. For the price, I am amazed. These knives are EXCELLENT. I so look forward to using them. They do not feel inexpensive at all. For the quality, I’d expect them to cost more! If you are thinking of buying, just go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These knives are super super sharp
reviews.reviewText: Be extremely careful when unboxing and using these knives. They are extremely sharp. They are easy to use and they cut like going through hot butter. Easy to clean and the block is decent. The handles are okay. I like a little bit bigger handles but these are fine. Overall I am impressed with the product considering the price. They are not a high end set of knives but the quality is far better than I originally expected. I’ve been using them for a month or two and have not needed to sharpen any of them. I have another more expensive set that seems to constantly need sharpening. No regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the money, this is a really nice knife set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: High quality set of high carbon stainless knives that should be much more expensive. I don’t know how they do it for this price, but I’m very happy with them. They look and perform great!
